statements: SELECT * FROM film_inventory;
SELECT film_id, dvd_quantity FROM film_inventory WHERE dvd_id = 1;
SELECT dvd_id, dvd_quantity FROM film_inventory WHERE film_id = 5;
SELECT film_id, dvd_id, dvd_quantity FROM film_inventory ORDER BY dvd_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM film_inventory WHERE film_id = 3 AND dvd_quantity > 5;
SELECT film_id, dvd_id, dvd_quantity FROM film_inventory
SELECT dvd_id, film_id, dvd_quantity FROM film_inventory
SELECT dvd_id, dvd_quantity, film_id FROM film_inventory
SELECT dvd_quantity, dvd_id, film_id FROM film_inventory
SELECT film_id, dvd_quantity, dvd_id FROM film_inventory
SELECT * FROM films
SELECT film_name, director FROM films
SELECT film_name, director, release_date FROM films WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT film_name FROM films WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan'
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT film_name, director FROM films WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM films JOIN inventory ON films.film_id = inventory.film_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 10;
SELECT film_name, director, release_date FROM films WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT film_name, director, release_date FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT film_name, director, release_date, quantity FROM films JOIN inventory ON films.film_id = inventory.film_id WHERE inventory.quantity < 5;
SELECT film_title, film_director FROM films
SELECT * FROM dvds WHERE dvd_id = 3
SELECT film_title, film_director FROM films WHERE film_id > 5
SELECT dvd_name FROM dvds ORDER BY dvd_id DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT film_title, film_director FROM films;
SELECT * FROM dvds WHERE dvd_id = 5;
SELECT film_title, dvd_name FROM films INNER JOIN dvds ON films.film_id = dvds.film_id;
SELECT film_title, quantity FROM films INNER JOIN dvds ON films.film_id = dvds.film_id INNER JOIN inventory ON dvds.dvd_id = inventory.dvd_id;
SELECT film_director, dvd_id, quantity FROM films INNER JOIN dvds ON films.film_id = dvds.film_id INNER JOIN inventory ON dvds.dvd_id = inventory.dvd_id WHERE film_director LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT film_name, release_date FROM Film;
SELECT * FROM DVD WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT director, film_name FROM Film WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT film_name, director FROM Film ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100;
SELECT film_name, director FROM Film WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT film_name, release_date FROM Film WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT * FROM DVD WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY dvd_id DESC;
SELECT film_name, release_date, director FROM Film JOIN DVD ON Film.film_id = DVD.film_id WHERE quantity_in_stock < 20;
SELECT trigger_name, timestamp FROM Trigger_History ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM film;
SELECT title, release_date FROM film WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT film.title, dvd.serial_number FROM film JOIN dvd ON film.film_id = dvd.film_id;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM film;
SELECT * FROM film ORDER BY release_date DESC, title ASC;
SELECT film.title, dvd.serial_number, inventory.quantity FROM film JOIN dvd ON film.film_id = dvd.film_id JOIN inventory ON dvd.dvd_id = inventory.dvd_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 0;

SELECT film.title, dvd.serial_number, trigger_log.timestamp FROM film JOIN dvd ON film.film_id = dvd.film_id JOIN trigger_log ON dvd.dvd_id = trigger_log.log_id WHERE trigger_log.trigger_type = 'update' AND dvd.serial_number LIKE '%ABC%';

SELECT film.title, COUNT(inventory.dvd_id) AS total_inventory FROM film LEFT JOIN dvd ON film.film_id = dvd.film_id LEFT JOIN inventory ON dvd.dvd_id = inventory.dvd_id GROUP BY film.title HAVING total_inventory > 5;

SELECT film.title, trigger_log.trigger_type, trigger_definition.trigger_name FROM film JOIN dvd ON film.film_id = dvd.film_id JOIN trigger_log ON dvd.dvd_id = trigger_log.log_id JOIN trigger_definition ON trigger_log.trigger_type = trigger_definition.trigger_action WHERE trigger_definition.trigger_condition LIKE '%error%';
